string.value: When #b#p9270062##k was in the city for travel, he was so excited that left the gift he got for his brother waiting in Kampung village. Little brother must be so disappointed to find out thre is no gift at all.

#b#p9270062##k must hurry and bring back those forgotten gift for his brother. 

#o9420538# #r#a45591##k 
#t4000476# #r#c4000476#/200#k
#b#p9270062##k's little brother was so thrilled to receive #b#t4000476##k as a gift. What a joy of giving presents to someone you really care for.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 44,500 Able to proceed to 'Merry-go-round in Kampung' as next quest.
Oh boy! I was so excited in the city that I forgot the gift I got for my brother! I'm in deep trouble now.
I need someone to bring as many #b#t4000476##k as quickly as possible. Perhaps you could do me a favor?
Great! Thanks a million. Please hunt #b200 #o9420538##k and bring #b200 #t4000476##k back to me as soon as possible.
C'mon! I don't want to make my little brother disappointed.
You sure did a great job collecting all these #b#t4000476##k in such a short period of time!
Yes! My little brother will be thrilled to see this gift!
Hurry up! My little brother will be here any minute now. I need enough #b#t4000476##k to surprise him.
#b#o9420538##k is the only one you can get #b#t4000476##k from. More to go!
